titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 3685) to prohibit employment discrimination on the basis of sexual orientation.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 110-422, by Ms. Castor.

All points of order against consideration of the bill are waived except those arising under clause 9 or 10 of rule XXI. Amendment number 3 in the report of the Committee on Rules may be withdrawn by its proponent before the question is put thereon.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 144.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 793.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by recorded vote: 224 - 192 (Roll no. 1052).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 218 - 205 (Roll no. 1053).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: 11/7/2007--Passed House without amendment. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 3685 (Employment Non-Discrimination Act of 2007).
